articles.title: Oregon's nursing board 'aware' of Salem nurse who posted TikTok video mocking COVID-19 protocol - Statesman Journal
articles.description: Oregon's board of nursing is aware of Salem's oncology nurse who posted a video showing disregard for COVID-19 restrictions — but remain mum if there's an investigation.
